creator: Smart Holy Bible Apps
descriptionHtml:
📖 La Santa Biblia Católica en español(Spanish Bible) is a FREE and Offline Bible. Read the Bible to feel the word of God. Download Now!

La Santa Biblia Católica en español(Spanish Bible) is the best Application to carry God’s Word. Have the Holy Bible at your fingertips anytime and anywhere you go. This daily Bible App contains the 66 books of the Old Testament and New Testament, providing an easier way to feel God’s word in your heart and to feel heaven closer to you and your loved ones.

Carry La Santa Biblia Católica en español(Spanish Bible) App wherever and whenever you want to help enlighten your mind with the complete, fast and easy to use daily Bible App.

💖CUSTOMIZE YOUR BIBLE

📖 Works Offline: Read the Holy Bible in offline without internet access.
📖 Easy Reading: Adjust font, text size and contrast for bright or low-light.
📖 Night mode: Night reading mode to facilitate reading the Holy Bible in night.
📖 Highlights: Mark favorite verses with all sorts of colors that gives it more meaning.
📖 Bookmarks: Catch up where you left off with a simple bookmark.
📖 Share Your Favorites: Share your favorite verses with friends on social media, email, or
SMS/text.
📖 Notes: Add important notes or comment for your interested verse.
📖 Quick Search:Make a Quick search for any book or term by using our Bible Dictionary.

Start your day fresh with a Daily Verse and Carry your soft-copy of La Santa Biblia Católica en español(Spanish Bible) with you anytime and anyplace you are or wish to go, and share God's Word to spread light and love to your close ones. La Santa Biblia Católica en español(Spanish Bible) App offers immaculate friendly features that will make your daily Bible reading a wonderful experience. This Bible is also known as The Holy Catholic Bible.

⛪READ BIBLE DAILY
📖 Prayer and Read Bible everyday with the help of Spanish Bible app.
📖 Immersive Christian Bible verse reading experience.
📖 Bible scriptures, reciting daily verses, sharing the Bible verses, all in one Bible App.
📖 Use this Spanish Bible Offline app for your daily devotional study and Christian bible reading.
📖 Keep in touch with friends everyday through sharing and discussing ideas with them.


Download 👉La Santa Biblia Católica en español(Spanish Bible)👈 Now! And Have An Abundant Life In Jesus Christ!!!



* Please, if you liked this app, support our project by rating and writing your testimonial on Google Play. It only takes a few seconds.
* If you did not like something or found any bugs, please let us know by e-mail at feedback@bibleall.net.
* All reviews are welcome.


God bless you all!

🌍 Visit:https: www.bibleall.net
👍 Join:https://www.facebook.com/BibleAllOfficial
